body_html: i wonder however why this behaves differently on cpu and gpu. perhaps on gpu the random seed is somehow serialized? what if instead of map_fn you just have an unstack/apply/stack sequence (different seed for each image)? same behavior?
body_text: i wonder however why this behaves differently on cpu and gpu.  perhaps on gpu the random seed is somehow serialized?  what if instead of map_fn you just have an unstack/apply/stack sequence (different seed for each image)?  same behavior?
